column4: hi all, I'm trying to do a simple thing. I need to open a boot file in edit mode so I can add my windows entry as it was lost during update. What is the command for sudo open /boot/grub/menu.lst
sudo apt-get /boot/grub/menu.lst or if you have kubuntu replace gedit with kate
oops sorry where did the apt-get come from? that should be "gedit"
